availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert S. Williams (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Nicholas County, Kentucky, native. Son of Sarah Williams. Married to Martha J. Victor Williams in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on December 4, 1855 . Father of Sarah E. Williams, Henry W. Williams, and Janey Williams. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 477B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 211A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 16.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994051, Nicholas County Marriages.
